about.hero_subtitle: Specialist Rubber Product - producing rubber products for Automotive, Railway and Other Industries
about.company_desc1: Sonamoo Rubber Tech is a Manufacturing Company that produces rubber products for Automotive, Railway and Other Industries. Based on long-term product development and manufacturing experience, we strive to create the best products.
about.company_desc2: By securing the highest level of human resources and extraordinary technology in various product fields, we are committed to providing high quality products, fast and accurate delivery and customer satisfaction.
about.company_desc3: With DH Industry Co.,Ltd, a Korean company that has achieved high growth with the belief in symbiosis and growing together with its customers, we produce high quality products that meet customer needs.
about.vision_mission_subtitle: Our commitment to building a competitive and sustainable rubber component industry
about.vision_content: To become one of the world-class Automotive, Electronic and Electric Rubber Component Suppliers supported by Reliable Human Resources and Technology Capabilities
about.mission_content: Developing Automotive, Electronics and Electric Component Industries that are competitive and becoming a Strategic Partner for Industry players in Indonesia and Regional and responsibly providing Positive contributions to the Company
about.location_subtitle: Visit our production facility or find us on the map for more information
about.address_content:
Kp. Tegal Pondoh RT.002/RW.003
Kelurahan Singabangsa
Kec. Tenjo, Kab. Bogor-16370
West Java, Indonesia
about.transport_content: Can be accessed via Jl. Raya Tenjo from Jakarta or Bogor direction. Strategic location close to Tangerang-Bogor industrial area.
about.facility_content: Complete production facilities with press machines, conveyor dryer ovens, and modern equipment for high-quality rubber production.
about.directions_jakarta: • From Jakarta: Take Tangerang-Merak toll road, exit at West Balaraja
about.directions_bogor: • From Bogor: Via Jl. Raya Tenjo towards Tangerang
about.directions_landmark: • Landmark: Near Tigaraksa Golf & Tangerang Regency
about.partnership_subtitle: Collaborating with leading companies to provide the best solutions
about.partnership_content: Technical cooperation with DH Industry Co.,Ltd Korea enables us to produce high quality products with cutting-edge technology and international standards.

right.title: Advanced Quality Control System for Rubber Products
right.description: Our comprehensive quality control system ensures every rubber product meets the highest standards through rigorous testing and inspection processes.

left.title: Modern Rubber Manufacturing Technology
left.description: Rubber production process using advanced machinery in the factory to produce high-quality products with international standards.

all.paragraph1: Sonamoo Rubber Tech produces high-quality rubber products for various industries. With over 7 years of experience and Korean technology, we are committed to providing the best solutions.
all.paragraph2: Our products include automotive, railway, and industrial components with international standards that meet global customer needs.

otomotif.paragraph1: Our automotive products are specifically designed for the motor vehicle industry with a focus on safety and durability. Including car stoppers, tire stoppers, speed bumps, and other components.
otomotif.paragraph2: All automotive products are equipped with anti-slip and weather-resistant technology to ensure optimal performance in various conditions.

railway.paragraph1: Our railway components are produced with international railway standards. Including ducts for railway vehicles and high-durability connecting components.
railway.paragraph2: Every railway product has undergone rigorous testing to ensure reliability and safety in railway transportation operations.

industrial.paragraph1: Our industrial products serve the needs of heavy industry, electronics, and manufacturing. Including silicone O-rings, NBR floats, seals, and precision electronic components.
industrial.paragraph2: Made with high-quality materials and advanced technology to meet strict technical specifications in modern industrial applications.

car_stopper.title: Car Stopper
car_stopper.description: Parking barrier for cars with hazard strip design for commercial parking areas.

tire_stopper.title: Tire Stopper
tire_stopper.description: Wheel barriers with sizes (1kg, 3kg, 8kg) for light to heavy vehicles.

speed_bump.title: Speed Bump
speed_bump.description: Speed reducer with anti-slip diamond profile for roads and parking areas.

connecting_rod.title: Connecting Rod
connecting_rod.description: Connecting rod for modular speed bump system with mounting holes.

rubber_step_floor.title: Rubber Step Floor
rubber_step_floor.description: Ergonomic anti-slip rubber flooring for motor vehicle stepping areas.

dumper_components.title: Dumper Components
dumper_components.description: Rubber components for heavy vehicles, dump trucks, and special automotive applications.

railway_duct.title: Duct for Railway Vehicles
railway_duct.description: Special air ducts for railway vehicles with international standards.

railway_connecting.title: Railway Connecting Components
railway_connecting.description: Connecting components for railway systems with high durability.

silicon_oring.title: Silicon O-Ring & Seals
silicon_oring.description: High-quality silicone O-rings for industrial and electronic applications.

nbr_float.title: NBR Float & Connectors
nbr_float.description: NBR floats and connectors for heavy industrial applications.

electronic_components.title: Electronic Components
electronic_components.description: Electronic components and silicone seals for precision industrial equipment.

cta.description: Get high-quality rubber solutions for your industrial needs. Our expert team is ready to help you choose the right products.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products and services

products.question: What are the main products manufactured by PT. Sonamoo Rubber Tech?
products.answer: We manufacture various high-quality rubber products including: Car Stopper, Tire Stopper (1kg, 3kg, 5kg), Speed Bump, Connecting Rod, Rubber Step Floor for motorcycles, NBR Float, Duct for Railway Vehicles, Silicon O-Ring & Seals, and various rubber components for electronics and automotive industries.

quality.question: How is product quality guaranteed with Korean technology?
quality.answer: We collaborate technically with DH Industry Co.,Ltd Korea which has decades of experience. Production technology, quality standards, and manufacturing processes follow Korean international standards. All products undergo strict quality control to ensure consistency and durability.

custom.question: Is custom manufacturing service available?
custom.answer: Yes, we provide custom manufacturing services according to customer specifications and needs. Our engineering team can help develop special rubber products with various materials such as NBR, Silicon, and other compounds according to required industrial applications.

ordering.question: How is the ordering process and production lead time?
ordering.answer: The ordering process begins with consultation to understand your needs. After final specifications, we will provide quotation and production timeline. Lead time varies depending on product complexity, generally 2-4 weeks for standard products and 4-8 weeks for custom products.

pricing.title: Customized Pricing
pricing.description: Each rubber product has different specifications. We provide the best price quotes based on volume, specifications, and your needs.

standard_quote.title: Standard Quote
standard_quote.description: For orders with standard specifications and regular volume.

custom_quote.title: Custom Quote
custom_quote.description: For special products with custom specifications and large volume.

reviews.text: PT Sonamoo's rubber product quality is very satisfying. On-time delivery and specifications meet our industrial needs. Highly recommended!
reviews.name: Budi Santoso

reviews.text: We have been cooperating with PT Sonamoo for 5 years for seal and gasket needs. The products are durable and service is excellent. Trusted partner!
reviews.name: Sari Wahyuni

reviews.text: Technical support team is very helpful in selecting the right rubber material for high temperature applications. The final results are very satisfying.
reviews.name: Ahmad Hidayat

reviews.text: Rubber sheet products with various thicknesses are completely available. Consistent quality and competitive prices. Very satisfied with the service.
reviews.name: Rina Sari

reviews.text: Custom rubber parts according to the drawings we provided. Precision tolerance and good finishing. Recommended for industrial needs.
reviews.name: Dedi Kurniawan

reviews.text: Reliable supplier for various grade rubber compound needs. Fast response time and ready stock for frequently needed items.
reviews.name: Indra Wijaya
